items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 245 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 50!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 94)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 95!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 35 distinct venues!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 60 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 13!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 45 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 10!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 30 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 7! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 15 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.badge_description: Hey, Beer Tourist, that's 2 venue check-ins! You're really getting to know the local beer scene. Level up your next beer journey: City Brew Tours include beer, transportation, a meal & VIP access at the best breweries in town. Get 10% Off now!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 130 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 27.

Beer and music share many similarities; different styles, different collaborations, some smooth, some loud. It’s no wonder they go together so well!

That's a beer at 5 different Music Venues! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 2!

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 110 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 23!
